Bash(docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml exec api python -c "
import litellm
import os

print(''Testing LiteLLM with OpenAI...'')

try:
    # Set the OpenAI API key for LiteLLM
    os.environ[''OPENAI_API_KEY''] = os.getenv(''OPENAI_API_KEY'')
    
    response = litellm.completion(
        model=''gpt-3.5-turbo'',
        messages=[{''role'': ''user'', ''content'': ''Hello''}],
        max_tokens=10
    )
    print(''LiteLLM test successful'')
    print(''Response:'', response.choices[0].message.content)
    
except Exception as e:
    print(''LiteLLM error:'', e)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc()
")
